titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University. MS Or 30 - FOLIO/FLAT: Uṣūl al-handasah wa-al-ḥisāb /

msContents.summary: Copy of the Arabic translation of Euclid's Elements through book XV with marginalia. Several leaves have been remounted because of damage.

respStmt.persName: Ṭūsī, Naṣīr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, 1201-1274
طوسي، نصير الدين محمد بن محمد،

supportDesc.extent: 95 foliated leaves : 285 x 165 (185 x 95) mm, bound to 295 x 190 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Foliation in ink in Hindu-Arabic numerals, upper left recto.

layoutDesc.layout: 24-26 long lines, with extensive marginalia and geometrical shapes.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in nastaʻliq with marginalia in rapid nastaʻliq; pointed, unvocalized.

binding.p: Red half leather binding with marbled paper sides. Sewn on recessed supports with hollow spine. Gold fillet lines and titling on spine.
